name: Blink Episode 2: Cause Fur Concern
description:
In the second episode of the BLINK series, we delve back into Amber City's mysteries with the appearance of a strange beast stalking the land.

Blink is the sole remaining protector of Amber City. Their mentor, the superhero who took them under the wing and taught them everything they knew, disappeared one day under suspect circumstances. Blink still struggles to understand what could have happened to them. Did someone kidnap them? And for what reason? These mysteries abound as Blink searches for answers while protecting the city at the same time. Perhaps the mysterious name Blink found among their mentor's scattered belongings can provide a clue to their questions.

Features
  • The deepening of the mysteries around Force Master...
  • Lycanthropy!
  • A stylized intro cinematic
  • Excellent character sprite-work artwork drawn by our artist!
  • This version also includes Episode 1, so if you need a refresh or haven't played Episode 1 before you can play it here with the Replay E1 option.
Characters

Blink (pronouns choosable)

The sidekick-turned-main-character of this superhero visual novel adventure. They have the ability to teleport themselves a fair distance away based on line of sight. The disappearance of Force Master has hit them hard, but they're not going to stand by and let mysteries go unsolved.

Force Master (he/him)

The classical Paragon of Good hero, famous for his telekinetic abilities and ability to hover effortlessly above the ground. He's gone missing recently, leaving the defense of Amber City on Blink's shoulders.

Nick Verde (he/him)

Force Master's old friend from times before Blink was even alive. A sharply-dressed entrepreneur with an even sharper mind. He's looking for clues too in the wake of Force Master's disappearance.

The Unknown Creature

Half-man, half-beast, all rage. This thing frightens Amber City at night, and leaves behind a trail of destruction.
